newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech 96 real ind output up 6.9 pct (+9.2 pct).
newsitem.headline: Czech 96 real ind output up 6.9 pct (+9.2 pct).

text.p: Czech preliminary real industrial output in December rose 1.4 percent, year-on-year, putting output 6.9 percent higher for the whole of 1996, the Czech Statistical Bureau (CSU) said on Thursday.
CZECH INDUSTRIAL OUPUT DEC 96 NOV 96 DEC 95 FY 96
Note. December 1996 and full year 1996 figures are preliminary. Definitive results from the CSU are expected to be released on February 17.

Wage results are taken from a survey of 210 firms with 100 or more employees. Production results also contain estimates from firms with up to 100 workers, as well as persons registered in the trades offices.
